FishingRod_Description: Use in the water to catch fish.
FishingRod_Training_Description: It's a lot easier to use than other rods, but can only catch basic fish.
FishingRod_AdvancedIridium_Description: Use in the water to catch fish. Up to two bobbers can be attached at once.
Hoe_Description: Used to dig and till soil.
Pan_Description: Use to gather ore from streams.
Pan_Steel_Description: Use to gather ore from streams. Has bigger and better yields than a copper pan. It also has a small chance to immediately cause another panning spot to appear.
Pan_Gold_Description: Use to gather ore from streams. Has bigger and better yields than a steel pan. It also has a small chance to immediately cause another panning spot to appear.
Pan_Iridium_Description: Use to gather ore from streams. Has the best yields of any pan. It also has a chance to immediately cause another panning spot to appear.
ReturnScepter_Description: The golden handle quivers with raw potential. Hold this scepter to the sky and return home at will.
Shears_Description: Use this to collect wool from sheep.
TrashCan_Description: When trashing an item, you reclaim {0}% of the value.
WateringCan_Description: Used to water crops. It can be refilled at any water source.
